io.mpos.transactions.actionresponse
Interface TransactionActionResponseFactory

public interface TransactionActionResponseFactory

Factory for creating action response messages in response to action required notification.

Since:
2.0.0

Method Summary
 TransactionActionResponse createResponseForApplicationSelection(ApplicationInformation selectedApplication)
           
 TransactionActionResponse createResponseForIdentificationAction(boolean verified)
          Creates a new response for a identification verification action.
 TransactionActionResponse createResponseForSignatureAction(Bitmap signature, boolean verified)
          Creates a new response for a signature action.
 TransactionActionResponse createResponseForSignatureOnReceiptAction(boolean verified)
          Creates a new response for a signature on receipt action.
 

Method Detail

createResponseForSignatureAction

TransactionActionResponse createResponseForSignatureAction(Bitmap signature,
                                                           boolean verified)
Creates a new response for a signature action.

Parameters:
signature - The signature to use for the transaction (Preferable a PNG android.graphics.Bitmap).
verified - True iff the signature has been verified against the signature on the card
Returns:
A new action response with the signature attached
Since:
2.0.0

createResponseForSignatureOnReceiptAction

TransactionActionResponse createResponseForSignatureOnReceiptAction(boolean verified)
Creates a new response for a signature on receipt action.

Parameters:
verified - True iff the signature has been verified against the signature on the card
Returns:
A new action response with the signature attached
Since:
2.3.0

createResponseForIdentificationAction

TransactionActionResponse createResponseForIdentificationAction(boolean verified)
Creates a new response for a identification verification action.

Parameters:
verified - True iff the identification of the card holder succeeded
Returns:
A new action response including whether the verification succeeded
Since:
2.0.0

createResponseForApplicationSelection

TransactionActionResponse createResponseForApplicationSelection(ApplicationInformation selectedApplication)
